cab.content: (P 3388)This Document is the Property of' H'3 Finnic lh^rs'i/ii Government.PYom Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, 27th April 1920.(Received 28th, 1.0 a.m.)Priority A.504 S. Secret. Afghanistan. Peshawar telegraphs that information has been received that Bolshevik Mission under Sur (? ic omitted) has left Kabul. Date of departure not known. Confirmation awaited.
